paragraphs: In the upcoming September, residents and guests of Prague can look forward to a spectacular event - the traditional reconstruction of the Battle of White Mountain (Bitva na Bílé hoře 2025).
Several hundred members of the historical club "Bílá hora 1620" will participate in it with authentic uniforms, weapons, horses, and pyrotechnic effects.
The event will take place over two weekend days - September 20 and 21.
The city district Prague 6 once again provided support to the organizers.
The Battle of White Mountain is a real historical event. It took place on November 8, 1620, and became one of the key events of the Thirty Years' War.
In that battle, Emperor Ferdinand II's 25,000-strong army defeated the 23,000-strong Protestant-Czech army.
This reconstruction is one of the largest in Europe. It will take place for the twenty-second time.

In addition to the battle itself, the event will offer guests a variety of entertainment in the field camp - various master classes, competitions for agility, strength, and accuracy, an authentic market, tents with ready-made dishes, and much more.
📍 Where: Obora Hvězda, Prague 6, Liboc (view on the map);
🕛 When: September 20 and 21, 2025 (Saturday and Sunday) from 12:00 to 18:00. The battle itself will start at the same time both days - at 15:00.
💰 Admission: 250 crowns for adults and 150 crowns for children (there are no online ticket sales. You can buy them on-site at the main entrance and only with cash).
ℹ️ Additional information about the promotion can be found here.
